text: haey real brachacheate krob chomnean yeung ban kamnt aoy mean pithi saamleh satv daembi aoy puokke romluk chhmoh robsa a l laoh(sautr bis̊mi ạllhi ) towleu avei del trong ban bratan leaphosakkar dl puokke ampi satvapahn teanglay . dau che neah mcheasa robsa puok anak kuchea mcheasa te muoy kt haey chaur puok anak braklkhluon tow champoh trong . haey chaur anak ( mou ham meat) phdal damnoeng rikreay dl banda anak del korp brate b tde ( tam bt b nhnh te d robsa trong)
